name: Duels (itch) (Vininski)
description:
Game supports 2-6 players in a hotseat/pass-n-play fashion. Take your turn without the other players seeing.

  1. Click to set move destination.
  2. Click again to set aim.
  3. Click end turn button to confirm.
  4. Pass to next player.

Once the last player ends their turn, press the play button and all players actions will play out simultaneously.  Turns repeat until the last person standing!

Please let me know what you think and keep in mind pretty much all the art assets are placeholders.

Music by: www.bensound.com
